fetchActiveBySku

public java.util.List<PriceChange> fetchActiveBySku(java.lang.String sku)
                                             throws DatabaseException
Description copied from interface: PriceChangeDao
Fetches active price changes by a given SKU number.

Prior to fetching the data, the implementation will need to parse sku into upper and lower parts. The lower half should be the lowest 8 digits. The upper half should be everythin greater than the lowers 8 digits, which is considered to be the overflow sku value. When the sku is 8 digits or less, then the upper half is required to equal "0".

Specified by:
fetchActiveBySku in interface PriceChangeDao
Parameters:
sku - a numeric String between 1 and 13 digits.
Returns:
a List of PriceChange objects related to sku
Throws:
DatabaseException

updateStatus

public int updateStatus(int pcNo,
                        java.lang.String newStatus)
                 throws DatabaseException
Description copied from interface: PriceChangeDao
Updates the status of a price change.

The change will effect both the header and detail records pertaining to the price change.

Specified by:
updateStatus in interface PriceChangeDao
Parameters:
pcNo - the price change number.
newStatus - the status indicator to change the price change record to. For closting a price change enter "C". For reopening a price change enter "O".
Returns:
the total number of rows efffected.
Throws:
DatabaseException

updateItemDetailsBySku

public int updateItemDetailsBySku(int pcNo,
                                  java.lang.String newStatus,
                                  java.util.List<PriceChangeSkuItem> items)
                           throws DatabaseException
Description copied from interface: PriceChangeDao
Updates the status of all line items belonging to a pcNo based on a set of particular related sku's.

Specified by:
updateItemDetailsBySku in interface PriceChangeDao
Parameters:
pcNo - the price change number
newStatus - the status indicator to change the price change line item record to. For closting a line item enter "C". For oopening a line item enter "O".
items - a List of PriceChangeSkuItem objects containing the sku and over flow sku information used to target specific line items to apply the updates.
Returns:
the total number of rows effected.
Throws:
DatabaseException
